author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Glove tip for tile work…hand safety is incredibly important, especially with grinders. I’m wearing an @ironclad_gloves 3/4 palm coated glove to grip my grinder and keep it steady. My left hand has a high cut-resistant glove that protects it from sharp objects. I highly recommend both gloves for work like this. Many thanks to Ironclad for partnering with me and making great products that protect people 🔥#ppe #tilework #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Glove Tips for Tile Work - #shorts #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
